snippet: Marco Rubio’s campaign unveiled an advertisement that shows former Gov. Jeb Bush showering his longtime Florida friend with praise, in a preview of what the senator may use should Mr. Bush go on the offensive in Tuesday night’s debate.
abstract: Marco Rubio’s campaign unveiled an advertisement that shows former Gov. Jeb Bush showering his longtime Florida friend with praise, in a preview of what the senator may use should Mr. Bush go on the offensive in Tuesday night’s debate.

headline.main: A Pre-emptive Strike From Marco Rubio, Using Jeb Bush’s Words
